attributes.action: Have the skatepark in kirriemuir, angus resurfaced/upgraded
attributes.additional_details: I feel it's the governments responsibility to make sure we have safe facilities to be able to exercise! Skate parks provide a place for people to socialize and learn. The park in kirriemuir being as pitted and unrideable as it is, is discouraging and dangerous for people that like skateboarding and rollerblading, A rotten smelly alley that is behind the premier in the square has been marked on Google maps as a skatepark, I feel it's a rather unsafe place for children to skate
attributes.background: I want action to be taken to fix something that has been left to rot nor been maintained, either resurface the flat ground area or a redesign of the park

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about public sports facilities, including skateparks, are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
